name: reportportal_tests
description: Testing Report Portal with JS (training project)

scripts.report-generate: npm run report-merge && marge reports/merged-report.json -o reports --charts true
scripts.test: npm run lint && cypress run --browser chrome --spec "cypress/e2e/tests/**.cy.js" || npm run report-generate
scripts.test-local: npm run lint && npm run pretest && cypress run --browser chrome --spec "cypress/e2e/tests/**.cy.js" --env ENV=local || npm run report-generate
scripts.jest-api-local: npm run lint && NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules ENV=local jest --config 'jest/jest.config.json' --maxWorkers 2
scripts.test-parallel: npm run lint && npm run pretest && cypress-parallel -s cy -t 2 -d cypress/e2e/tests -a '"--config-file cypress.config.js"' -r cypress-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=parallel-reporter-config.json || npm run report-generate
scripts.test-parallel-local: npm run lint && npm run pretest && cypress-parallel -s cy -t 2 -d cypress/e2e/tests -a '"--env ENV=local --config-file cypress.config.js"' -r cypress-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=parallel-reporter-config.json || npm run report-generate
scripts.test-bdd: npm run lint && npm run pretest && cypress run --browser chrome --spec "cypress/integration/*feature" || npm run report-generate
scripts.test-bdd-local: npm run lint && npm run pretest && cypress run --browser chrome --spec "cypress/integration/*feature" --env ENV=local || npm run report-generate
scripts.test-bdd-parallel: npm run lint && npm run pretest && cypress-parallel -s cy -t 2 -d cypress/integration -a '"--config-file cypress.config.js"' -r cypress-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=parallel-reporter-config.json || npm run report-generate
scripts.test-bdd-parallel-local: npm run lint && npm run pretest && cypress-parallel -s cy -t 2 -d cypress/integration -a '"--env ENV=local --config-file cypress.config.js"' -r cypress-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=parallel-reporter-config.json || npm run report-generate
scripts.cy-tags: cypress-tags run  --browser chrome --env TAGS="@ui and not (@delete2 or @create)"
scripts.test-bdd-parallel-tags: npm run lint && npm run pretest && cypress-parallel -s cy-tags -t 2 -d cypress/integration -a '"--config-file cypress.config.js"' -r cypress-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=parallel-reporter-config.json || npm run report-generate

author: Yauhen Viazau
